item.title: Bigg Boss 18 Ticket To Finale Winner: Vivian Wins TTF Task But Creates History With Major Twist - Deets Inside - Filmibeat
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18 Ticket To Finale Winner: Vivian Wins TTF Task But Creates History With Major Twist - Deets Inside

Published: Tuesday, January 7, 2025, 22:28 [IST]

Bigg Boss 18 has introduced a significant twist in its journey with the ticket to finale task. After 13 weeks of intense competition, contestants Vivian Dsena and Chum Darang emerged as the top contenders. Vivian won the task but made history by refusing the ticket to finale.

  • Bigg Boss 18, hosted by Salman Khan, has kept audiences engaged with its contestant lineup.
  • Vivian Dsena won the ticket to finale task against Chum Darang.
  • In an unprecedented move, Vivian refused to accept the ticket, marking the first time a contestant has done so.
  • Three contestants are currently facing elimination: Rajat Dalal, Chaahat Pandey, and Shrutika Arjun.
“While I won the ticket to final task, I refuse to accept it.” - Vivian Dsena

This twist adds an unexpected layer of drama to the show, leaving fans eager for the next developments.

item.title: Positive News for Game Changer in Telangana - TrackTollywood
item.description:
Positive News for Game Changer in Telangana

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Track Tollywood

There is positive news for Game Changer in Telangana. The latest inside reports suggest that producer Dil Raju received a positive response for the ticket hike and extra shows permission from the Telangana government.

  • The Telangana government is expected to release the official GO on 8th January.
  • Bookings for Game Changer will be opened immediately once the GO is released.
  • Producer Dil Raju has specifically requested a ticket hike for Game Changer, while other films will be released at regular prices.
  • The film needs to collect more than 50 Cr share in Nizam for its valued business.

This is encouraging news that could benefit not only Dil Raju but also upcoming films in the region.

item.title: Hugh Jackman and Sutton Foster take their secret romance public on PDA-filled night - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Hugh Jackman and Sutton Foster take their secret romance public on PDA-filled night

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Hugh Jackman and Sutton Foster were spotted on a cozy date night in Santa Monica, confirming their budding romance that began during their time on Broadway.

  • The couple was seen holding hands on their first public outing.
  • Jackman and Foster have both recently ended their respective marriages.
  • An eyewitness reported they were photographed walking together.
“Walking hand in hand,” an eyewitness shared with PageSix.

The sighting of Jackman and Foster is a significant step in their relationship, which reportedly blossomed during their Broadway collaboration.

item.title: Not Venkatesh, but this top hero was the first choice for Sankranthiki Vasthunam - 123telugu
item.description:
Not Venkatesh, but this top hero was the first choice for Sankranthiki Vasthunam

Published on: Jan 7, 2025 10:01 pm IST

Venkatesh is set to entertain audiences with the fun thriller Sankranthiki Vasthunam, directed by Anil Ravipudi. The film features Aishwarya Rajesh and Meenakshi Chaudhary as the female leads.

  • The theatrical trailer for the movie was launched recently and received a good response.
  • Anil Ravipudi initially planned to cast Megastar Chiranjeevi in the film.
  • Ravipudi mentioned his desire to return to comedy after a serious subject and made modifications to the screenplay based on the lead actor.
Anil Ravipudi: “Initially, I thought of doing this film with Megastar Chiranjeevi Garu, but he was busy with other projects.”

This project signifies a shift back to comedy for Anil Ravipudi, showcasing his versatility as a director.

item.title: Marco star Unni Mukundan says film won't influence people to go on a ‘killing spree’: ‘Nothing happened after KGF’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Unni Mukundan Defends 'Marco' Against Violence Claims

Publication Date: Jan 07, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The new Malayalam film 'Marco', featuring Unni Mukundan as a vengeful gangster, has attracted critical attention for its portrayal of violence. In a recent interview, Mukundan emphasized that the film does not aim to influence violent behavior in audiences.

  • The film presents a raw portrayal of violence in a narrative about vengeance.
  • Unni Mukundan argues that audiences understand it's just a film meant for entertainment.
  • He cited 'KGF' as a successful film but questioned its societal influence, noting that nothing significant happened in its aftermath.
  • 'Marco' has been a box office success since its release on December 20, 2024.
“I have been told that people had a tough time watching it but that was it. That was the whole idea of giving a certain kind of experience.” - Unni Mukundan

The film aims to push the boundaries of violence in cinema while emphasizing that it should be viewed as a work of fiction.

item.title: Ekta Kapoor posts cryptic note slamming 'unprofessional actors' on Instagram; netizens guess names - India Forums
item.description:
Ekta Kapoor Criticizes Unprofessional Actors on Instagram

Published: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 at 4:10 PM

Ekta Kapoor has used her Instagram platform to address unprofessional actors, emphasizing that skewed stories will only last as long as she remains silent. She believes in maintaining her dignity and hints that there might be certain actors who are misrepresenting her shows.

  • Ekta Kapoor calls out unprofessional actors on Instagram.
  • She mentions the importance of silence in her response to false claims.
  • Netizens speculate about the actors she refers to, with guesses including Ram Kapoor, Rajeev Khandelwal, and Paras Chhabra.
  • Recent discussions point towards creative dissatisfaction within the industry.
  • Fans defend Sriti Jha against unsubstantiated claims.
“Everything is fine as long as I do not clarify matters. I believe in the dignity of silence.”

In conclusion, Ekta Kapoor's remarks have sparked considerable speculation among fans and artists alike, with many curious about the identities of the actors she might be addressing.

item.title: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer 'Pushpa 2: The Rule' to include 20-minute bonus footage in the - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2: The Rule to Feature 20-Minute Bonus Footage

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Film News

Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna's much-anticipated film, 'Pushpa 2: The Rule', is set to include an exciting 20-minute bonus footage in its upcoming reloaded version, promising to enhance the viewing experience for fans.

  • The film will feature new scenes that were not part of the original cut.
  • This bonus content aims to attract more audiences and keep the excitement alive for the franchise.
  • Fans are eagerly awaiting details on the storyline progression with the added footage.
“The reloaded version is designed to provide an extended journey for the audience,” said a spokesperson for the film.

The addition of 20 minutes of footage reflects the filmmakers' commitment to deliver a more enriching cinematic experience, keeping fans engaged and interested in the franchise's future.

item.title: ‘Wore dresses permitted under law’: Actor Honey Rose accuses businessman Boby Chemmanur of obscene remarks - The Indian Express
item.description:
Actor Honey Rose Accuses Businessman Boby Chemmanur of Making Obscene Remarks

Publication Date: Tuesday, Source: Indian Express

Malayalam actor Honey Rose has filed a complaint against businessman Boby Chemmanur for making obscene remarks about her on social media, leading to police action.

  • Kochi city police have registered a case after Honey Rose's complaint.
  • Approximately 30 individuals made sexist comments targeting the actor on social media.
  • Boby Chemmanur has been booked under serious charges, including sexual harassment.
  • Honey Rose announced her intent to combat all obscene remarks directed at her.
  • She expressed that while she accepts comments on her attire, there must be boundaries.
  • Many in the film industry and AMMA have shown their support to her, promising legal assistance.
“I have only worn dresses that are permitted under prevailing laws in the country.” - Honey Rose

This incident highlights ongoing issues related to harassment of women in the entertainment industry and the importance of supporting victims.

item.title: Archana Puran Singh recalls husband Parmeet Sethi threatened to ‘divorce’ her when she spoke about buying their bungalow in Madh Island; here’s how they built it together - The Times of India
item.description:
Archana Puran Singh recalls husband Parmeet Sethi threatened to ‘divorce’ her when she spoke about buying their bungalow in Madh Island; here’s how they built it together

Date: Jan 7, 2025, Source: ETimes.in

Archana Puran Singh and Parmeet Sethi share the emotional journey of purchasing their bungalow in Madh Island. The couple speaks candidly about challenges faced and humorous moments that punctuated their house-hunting experience.

  • Archana and Parmeet discussed their personal journey of selecting a home during a podcast.
  • Parmeet humorously threatened to divorce Archana during discussions about the bungalow.
  • Archana revealed that she found a cheap property and decided to buy it.
  • Parmeet admitted he was initially against buying the bungalow but grew to love it.
  • The couple also shared how their differences in living arrangements created confusion.
  • They have plans for using the bungalow as a holiday home.
“He said, ‘I will allow you to buy one’, imagine, he would allow me.” - Archana Puran Singh

In conclusion, Archana and Parmeet's story reflects their love and commitment not only in marriage but also in building a shared dream of owning a home.

item.title: Aamir Khan takes 'Mannat' to quit smoking if Junaid Khan’s film 'Loveyapa' gets its success - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Aamir Khan's Promise to Quit Smoking for Son Junaid's Film Success

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Aamir Khan has vowed to quit smoking if his son Junaid Khan’s upcoming romantic comedy 'Loveyapa' becomes a success. The film is generating buzz, and Aamir's commitment showcases his support for Junaid.

  • Junaid Khan is set to star in 'Loveyapa' alongside Khushi Kapoor.
  • The romantic comedy features themes relevant to modern life, including technology's impact on relationships.
  • Aamir Khan praised the performances in the film and likened Khushi's energy to her mother, Sridevi.
  • 'Loveyapa' will release in theaters on February 7, 2025.
Aamir Khan on the film: "I liked this film, it is very entertaining... All the actors have done a good job."

Overall, Aamir Khan's gesture not only highlights his bond with his son but also generates interest in 'Loveyapa', setting it up as a potential box-office success.

item.title: Ajith Kumar crashes race car into barrier ahead of 24H Dubai 2025. Watch video - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ajith Kumar's Race Car Crash Ahead of 24H Dubai 2025

Publication Date: Jan 07, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Ajith Kumar returned to racing after over a decade and faced an incident during a practice run for the 24H Dubai 2025, losing control of his car but fortunately escaping unhurt.

  • Ajith crashed his race car into a barrier during a practice session.
  • The crash occurred around 12:45 PM local time.
  • His team confirmed that he was unharmed and immediately switched to another car to continue practice.
  • Ajith Kumar owns a racing team called Ajith Kumar Racing.
  • The 24H Dubai 2025 is scheduled for January 11-12.
“Yes, he narrowly escaped an accident… Ajith shifted to another race car because this one was totalled and continued practice. Thankfully, he is unharmed.” – Ajith's team

This incident underscores Ajith's return to competitive racing and his dedication to the sport after a long hiatus.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan’s Bhooth Bangla has a strong Bhool Bhulaiyaa connect – Here’s how - PINKVILLA
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan’s Bhooth Bangla has a strong Bhool Bhulaiyaa connect – Here’s how

Published on: Jan 07, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The upcoming film Bhooth Bangla connects back to the cult classic Bhool Bhulaiyaa featuring Akshay Kumar and Priyadarshan. The filming commenced in Jaipur, bringing back the original team to the same location used for Bhool Bhulaiyaa after 18 years.

  • 18 years after Bhool Bhulaiyaa, the duo reunites for Bhooth Bangla.
  • Filming takes place primarily at Chomu Palace in Jaipur, similar to the original.
  • The film is touted as a blend of horror and comedy, featuring a significant VFX component.
  • It includes an ensemble cast with Akshay Kumar, Wamiqa Gabbi, Tabu, and others.
  • Bhooth Bangla is set to release in April 2026.
“The team is thrilled to be shooting at the same spot after 18 long years,” revealed a source close to the development.

The return of Kumar to this film genre marks an exciting development for fans of horror-comedy in Indian cinema.

item.title: Chiranjeevi Highly Confident On 'Game Changer'.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Chiranjeevi Highly Confident On 'Game Changer'

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Megastar Chiranjeevi has expressed immense confidence in his son Ram Charan’s upcoming movie, Game Changer.

  • Chiranjeevi emphasized that Charan has delivered an award-worthy performance in the film.
  • He has watched the movie twice and believes it will be a major success.
  • Fans were delighted during his personal interaction at a recent event.
  • Special shows and ticket prices have been announced in Andhra Pradesh as the release date approaches.
“You can hold your heads high with pride,” Chiranjeevi assured the fans.

As excitement builds, Game Changer is set to release this Friday, creating a significant buzz among fans.

item.title: Prithviraj-Starrer The Goat Life Reaches Final Oscar Shortlist, Director Blessy Says He's 'Elated' - News18
item.description:
Prithviraj-Starrer The Goat Life Reaches Final Oscar Shortlist, Director Blessy Says He's 'Elated'

Date: January 08, 2025
Source: News18

The Goat Life has made it to the final shortlist for nominations at the 97th Academy Awards, creating excitement among the filmmakers and fans alike.

  • The film is competing for the Best Film category.
  • It aims to secure a spot among the top 10 finalists for final nominations.
  • Director Blessy expressed his joy, highlighting the screenings held across the US and Europe.
  • The film has grossed Rs 100 crore within nine days of its release.
  • It features a star-studded cast, including Prithviraj and Hollywood's Jimmy Jean-Louis.
“This is incredible news for all of us who worked on this project. Even making it onto this shortlist is an achievement in itself.” - Blessy

The Goat Life's recognition marks a significant achievement for the film industry, showcasing the talent and hard work behind it.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office: 20 Minutes Of Additional Footage But 3 Records That May Still Remain Unbeaten By Allu Arjun’s 1700 Crore+ Blockbuster! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office: 20 Minutes Of Additional Footage But 3 Records That May Still Remain Unbeaten

Publication Date: December 5, 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2: The Rule was released in theatres worldwide, achieving significant box office earnings but falling short of breaking three key records. The film features Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, and Fahadh Faasil.

  • Current worldwide earnings stand at 1748.28 crores.
  • It is the highest-grossing film in India with a domestic total of 1235.03 crores.
  • The film has accumulated profits of 147% against its budget of 500 crores.
“Box office numbers are based on estimates and various sources. Numbers have not been independently verified by Koimoi.”

The upcoming reloaded version of the film is set to feature 20 minutes of additional footage, targeting both new audience members and those who have already watched the film.

item.title: Unstoppable with NBK: Ram Charan reveals his favorite actress - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan Reveals His Favorite Actress on Unstoppable with NBK

Publication Date: January 7, 2025 Source: 123Telugu

Global star Ram Charan's special episode on Unstoppable with NBK Season 4 is highly anticipated, where he discusses his personal life and film career.

  • Ram Charan selected Samantha Ruth Prabhu as his favorite actress among Kiara Advani and Alia Bhatt.
  • The episode promises fun and candid conversations under the hosting of Balakrishna.
  • Premieres on January 8, 2025, at 7 PM on Aha.
“Packed with heartfelt moments and engaging conversations.”

Stay tuned for the episode's airing for more exclusive insights.

item.title: Who Is Bigg Boss 18 Contestant Chaahat Pandey's Boyfriend? KRK Reveals Name - Oneindia
item.description:
Who Is Bigg Boss 18 Contestant Chaahat Pandey's Boyfriend? KRK Reveals Name

Published: Tuesday, January 7, 2025, 17:57 [IST] by Gaurav Sharma

Television actress Chaahat Pandey is under the spotlight due to her rumored relationship with a mystery man. Claims have arisen from her Bigg Boss 18 co-contestants, including surprising assertions from host Salman Khan.

  • Chaahat's mother has publicly challenged the show's producers to provide evidence of her daughter's alleged boyfriend.
  • Kamaal R Khan (KRK) claims that Chaahat is dating TV actor Manas Shah and has revealed this information online.
  • During an episode of Bigg Boss 18, co-contestant Avinash Mishra suggested that Chaahat received gifts from her boyfriend while filming.
  • Chaahat's mother has offered a reward of 21 lakh rupees for proof of her daughter's boyfriend.
"Since #ChahatPandey mother challenges @ColorsTV @BiggBoss to find out Chahat's boyfriend, so I am helping them." - KRK

The ongoing drama surrounding Chaahat Pandey continues to keep audiences engaged as new details emerge about her personal life.

item.title: Ram Charan, Pawan Kalyan offer ₹20 lakh to families of 2 fans who died while returning from Game Changer event - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ram Charan, Pawan Kalyan offer ₹20 lakh to families of 2 fans who died while returning from Game Changer event

Date: January 07, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Two fans returning from the pre-release event of Game Changer tragically died in an accident. In response, Ram Charan and Pawan Kalyan have offered financial support to their families.

  • Aarava Manikanta and Thokada Charan died in a road accident after attending the Game Changer event in Rajahmundry.
  • Both actors pledged ₹20 lakh to the families, alongside additional support from producer Dil Raju.
  • Pawan Kalyan criticized past governance for neglecting the road where the accident occurred.
  • Dil Raju expressed regret over the incident, emphasizing the importance of fan safety during events.
“It’s unfortunate when such incidents happen during such happy moments; it’s painful. My condolences to the families.” - Dil Raju

This incident highlights the unexpected tragedies that can occur during celebration events, prompting calls for better safety measures.

item.title: Ram Charan, Pawan Kalyan offer 20 lakh to families of 2 fans who died while returning from Game Changer event - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ram Charan, Pawan Kalyan offer ₹20 lakh to families of 2 fans who died while returning from Game Changer event

Date: January 07, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Two fans returning from the pre-release event of Game Changer tragically died in an accident. In response, Ram Charan and Pawan Kalyan have offered financial support to their families.

  • Aarava Manikanta and Thokada Charan died in a road accident after attending the Game Changer event in Rajahmundry.
  • Both actors pledged ₹20 lakh to the families, alongside additional support from producer Dil Raju.
  • Pawan Kalyan criticized past governance for neglecting the road where the accident occurred.
  • Dil Raju expressed regret over the incident, emphasizing the importance of fan safety during events.
“It’s unfortunate when such incidents happen during such happy moments; it’s painful. My condolences to the families.” - Dil Raju

This incident highlights the unexpected tragedies that can occur during celebration events, prompting calls for better safety measures.

item.title: Tom Holland won't ‘rush a wedding’ with Zendaya post engagement; he always knew 'she was the one' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Tom Holland won't ‘rush a wedding’ with Zendaya post engagement; he always knew 'she was the one'

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Tom Holland and Zendaya have gotten engaged, as confirmed by an insider, although the couple has not discussed their plans publicly. The engagement follows years of dating after meeting on the set of Spider-Man: Far from Home.

  • Zendaya was spotted with a large diamond ring at the Golden Globes.
  • Tom expressed he had long wanted to propose, having always known Zendaya was special to him.
  • Reports indicate the couple will take their time planning a wedding due to their busy schedules.
  • Details of their relationship have been closely followed since they began dating.
“He's always been crazy about her. He always knew she was the one. They have something very special.”

While the couple enjoys their engagement, they are focused on their respective careers, with upcoming projects including Spider-Man 4 and a new film directed by Christopher Nolan.

item.title: Pic Talk: Nithiin’s affectionate birthday wish for his wife goes viral - 123telugu
item.description:
Nithiin's Heartfelt Birthday Wish for His Wife Goes Viral

Published on: Jan 7, 2025 4:00 pm IST

Tollywood actor Nithiin shares an affectionate birthday wish for his wife, Shalini, on Instagram, which quickly goes viral with fans joining in the celebrations.

  • Nithiin posted a touching image of himself kissing Shalini on her birthday.
  • The post received a significant amount of likes and comments from fans.
  • Nithiin is currently preparing for his upcoming film, Robinhood, and also working on Thammudu.
“Happiest Birthday to my one and only love, Shalini.”

The heartfelt expression of love between the couple has struck a chord with the public, showcasing the actor's personal side amidst his professional commitments.

item.title: Salman Khan's Galaxy home gets a security boost with bulletproof windows and safety upgrades - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Salman Khan's Galaxy Home Upgrades Security with Bulletproof Windows

Published: 07 January 2025, 10:29 IST

Bollywood superstar Salman Khan’s iconic home, ‘Galaxy,' is undergoing a major transformation. It is being equipped with advanced safety features, including a large bulletproof window on the balcony, which has garnered attention and is trending on social media.

  • Bulletproof windows and an advanced security system are being installed.
  • A high-resolution CCTV camera has been set up to detect unusual activity.
  • Large bulletproof glass has been placed to secure the balcony from where Salman waves to fans.
  • These upgrades follow a death threat to Salman Khan from the Lawrence Bishnoi gang.
  • Salman Khan has increased his personal security and upgraded his travel methods.
  • In October 2024, he purchased a bulletproof Nissan Patrol SUV to enhance safety.
“The superstar is receiving death threats related to the killing of two Blackbucks in Rajasthan back in 1998.”

The Bishnoi community, which considers the Blackbuck a sacred animal, has urged Salman Khan to issue an apology for the incidents that sparked these threats.

item.title: Taarak Mehta fame Gurucharan Singh shares video from hospital; says ‘Halat bahut kharab hogayi thi…’ - The Times of India
item.description:
Taarak Mehta Fame Gurucharan Singh Shares Hospital Video

Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

Gurucharan Singh, known for his role in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah, has shared a heartfelt video from the hospital where he expressed his struggles during a difficult time in his health.

  • He revealed that his condition was very serious, stating, 'Halat bahut kharab hogayi thi.'
  • The video serves as a personal update for fans who have been concerned about his well-being.
  • Fans have shown immense support and concern through social media channels.
“Halat bahut kharab hogayi thi…” - Gurucharan Singh

This video highlights not only the actor's health challenges but also the importance of the support system around him as he navigates through his recovery.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 33: Allu Arjun film’s chances of dethroning Dangal now slim - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 33: Allu Arjun film’s chances of dethroning Dangal now slim

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2 has experienced a notable slowdown in box office collections five weeks post-release, struggling to surpass the record set by Dangal.

  • The film saw a 65.28% drop in collections, earning ₹2.5 crore on day 33.
  • Total collections in India amount to ₹1208.7 crore net and ₹1441 crore gross.
  • Pushpa 2 has set records, previously beating Baahubali 2.
  • To surpass Dangal, the film must collect ₹239 crore more, which seems unlikely without additional marketing.
“We might not beat Dangal's worldwide record.”

Despite breaking several records, the diminishing box office returns present challenges for Pushpa 2 in its quest for the top spot.
